name: Companion Monster
description:
A playdate game in development.

This game is about peting your monster, feed him, make him do his needs. Enrich and buy improvements to make him happy.

Aside this peting activity, you'll have some mini-games, on wich I'm currently focus

First playable minigame : Fall into Holes,
You controll the ball with accelerometer. Avoid walls or you'll lose time. For each levels, you have 10s + (remaining time from previous level / 2)

I'll make a new release for each new playable minigame (and I will add a game selector menu)
